Katrina M. Eichstaedt named an Associate in Oil, Gas and Mineral Services Group

5/11/2018

Dickie, McCamey & Chilcote, P.C. has announced that Katrina M. Eichstaedt has become an associate in the firm’s Oil, Gas and Mineral Services Group. She is based in the firm’s Pittsburgh office. Ms. Eichstaedt makes the transition into the staff position after serving as a contract attorney with the firm since August 2017.

The DMC Oil, Gas and Mineral Services Group is part of the Real Estate Group. These specially skilled attorneys produce certified mineral title opinions including complex drilling title opinions and title curative and perform land and legal due diligence associated with mineral transactions.

Before joining Dickie McCamey, Ms. Eichstaedt was an attorney abstractor researching complete title abstracts in addition to surface and mineral ownership in the oil and gas industry in Ohio, Pennsylvania, and West Virginia since March 2014.

The Michigan native is an unapologetic sports fan. “My heart still belongs to my Detroit teams, especially the Tigers and Lions, although I will always root for my Pittsburgh teams, too, as long as they aren’t playing Detroit,” Ms. Eichstaedt explains. Before and during the early years of her undergraduate work at Oakland University, she briefly contemplated a drama career and earned IMDb credit on her resume.

Ms. Eichstaedt received her LL.M. in Corporate Law and Finance from Western Michigan University’s Thomas M. Cooley Law School in 2013 after earning her J.D. from the same institution in 2011.

# # #

About Dickie, McCamey & Chilcote, P.C.
Dickie, McCamey & Chilcote, P.C. is a nationally-recognized law firm providing comprehensive legal expertise in a multitude of practice areas. Headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, and founded more than 100 years ago, the firm serves industry-leading clients across the country from offices throughout the mid-Atlantic region in Pennsylvania, Delaware, New Jersey, New York, North Carolina, Ohio, South Carolina, West Virginia, the Southwestern region of California, and the Rocky Mountain region of Colorado. For more information: 800-243-5412 or www.dmclaw.com.

Susan H. Briggs Receives 2017 Altec “All-Star Award”

4/5/2018

Susan H. Briggs, shareholder of Dickie, McCamey & Chilcote, P.C., was presented with the Altec “All-Star Award” 2017 at a meeting held on March 24, 2018, in Sea Island, Georgia.

Altec Industries presents this award annually to members of Altec legal panel counsel in recognition of best outcomes and representation. This is the second Altec “All-Star Award” Ms. Briggs has received for favorable results in the defense of workers’ compensation and employment law cases for Altec. She received her first “All-Star Award” for legal work performed in 2015.

Ms. Briggs is a Board Certified Specialist in workers’ compensation and has practiced law for over two decades. She serves on Dickie McCamey’s Executive Committee and is the Shareholder-in-Charge of the firm’s Charlotte, North Carolina, office. She received her Juris Doctor from the Univeristy of North Carolina School of Law.
